trends: There have been no other sightings in highway 20 west bound
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting Details I noticed a strange looking cloud totally out of place and not looking like any cloud i have ever seen. While looking at it I thought I saw somthing fly out of it twice. so i took pictures with my cell phone from about half a mile away. At the time we were in Columbia county Georgia .driving west bound on highway 20. After about 10 minutes the object just seemed to to melt away.I loaded the pictures into my computer and elarged them and saw some objects comming from the cloud as I though the first time the object came into view......pictures attached.
